Garlic O
pills O
do O
n't O
lower O
cholesterol O
, O
study O
finds O
. O
LONDON O
1996 O
- O
08-22 O
Garlic O
pills O
may O
not O
lower O
blood O
cholesterol O
and O
studies O
that O
show O
they O
do O
may O
be O
flawed O
, O
British MISC
researchers O
have O
reported O
. O
A O
study O
by O
a O
team O
of O
doctors O
at O
Oxford ORG
University ORG
has O
found O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
do O
not O
benefit O
significantly O
from O
taking O
garlic O
tablets O
. O
The O
study O
involved O
115 MISC
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
levels O
. O
They O
were O
given O
900 MISC
milligrams MISC
a O
day O
of O
dried O
garlic O
powder O
or O
placebo O
tablets O
. O
" O
There O
were O
no O
significant O
differences O

Princess PER

latest O
programmes O
and O
do O
not O
need O
to O
store O
more O
software O
than O
they O
are O
currently O
using O
on O
their O
computers O
at O
any O
one O
time O
, O
also O
saving O
costs O
of O
memory O
and O
storage O
. O
Chris PER
Zuleeg PER
, O
a O
veteran O
of O
Apple ORG
and O
a O
former O
JavaSoft ORG
marketing O
manager O
, O
is O
vice O
president O
of O
marketing O
at O
Internet O

, O

the O
ground O
- O

SOCCER O
- O

PLANE O
. O
Brian PER
Homewood PER
RIO O
DE O
JANEIRO O
1996 O
- O

. O

. O

OSCE O

. O
Kurt PER
Schork PER

- O
08-26 O

( O
OSCE ORG
) O

for O

. O
" O

... O

will O

of O

only O
... O

will O

on O

, O
" O
OSCE O

were O

, O

. O
The O

agreement O
gave O
the O
OSCE ORG
a O

to O
organise O
Bosnian MISC
elections O
. O
The ORG
Provisional ORG
Election ORG
Commission ORG
is O
OSCE ORG
's O
top O

- O
making O
body O
for O
the O

. O
More MISC
than MISC

have O

in O

around O
the O
world O
, O

. O

, O

SEC ORG
adopts O
rules O
to O
improve O
investor O
access O
to O
best O
stock O
prices O
. O
WASHINGTON O
1996 MISC
- O
08-28 O
The ORG
Securities ORG
and ORG
Exchange ORG
Commission ORG
Wednesday MISC
approved O
rules O
designed O
to O
give O
stock O
market O
investors O
a O
better O
chance O
at O
getting O
the O
best O
price O
available O
for O
their O
orders O
. O
The O
so O
- O
called O
order O
handling O
rules O
, O
which O
were O
proposed O
last MISC
September MISC
, O
were O
approved O
in O
a O
4 MISC
- O
0 O
vote O
. O
The O
new O
rules O
will O
require O
specialists O
at O
stock O
exchanges O
and O
market O
makers O
on O
Nasdaq ORG
to O
allow O
customers O
to O
view O
price O
quotes O
from O
other O
electronic O
trading O
systems O
that O
may O
not O
be O
readily O
available O
to O
them O
. O
The O
rules O
will O
also O
require O
that O
customer O
limit O
orders O
be O
displayed O
with O
prices O
better O
than O
those O
available O
in O
quotes O
publicly O
available O
at O
the O
time O
. O
Specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
are O
companies O
or O
individuals O
recognised O
as O
qualified O
to O
maintain O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
a O
stock O
. O
In O
a O
limit O
order O
, O
investors O
specify O
the O
price O
at O
which O
they O
are O
willing O
to O
buy O
or O
sell O
, O
as O
opposed O
to O
a O
market O
order O
executed O
at O
prevailing O
prices O
. O
" O
These O
rules O
are O
intended O
to O
empower O
all O
investors O
, O
by O
allowing O
their O
orders O
to O
compete O
on O
a O
level O
playing O
field O
, O
and O
by O
providing O
the O
disclosure O
they O
need O
to O
make O
informed O
decisions O
, O
" O
said O
SEC ORG
Chairman O
Arthur PER
Levitt PER
. O
The O
SEC ORG
's O
goal O
, O
he O
added O
, O
was O
to O
create O
" O
one MISC
system O
where O
one MISC
price O
could O
be O
available O
to O
everybody O
. O
" O
The O
director O
of O
the O
SEC ORG
's O
division O
of O
market O
regulation O
, O
Richard PER

, O
said O
Wall O

firms O
will O
probably O
need O
to O
spend O
about MISC
$ MISC
7 MISC
million MISC
to O
carry O
out O
the O
improvements O
called O
for O
by O
the O
new O
rules O
. O
In O
proposing O
the O
rules O
last MISC
year MISC
, O
the O
SEC ORG
noted O
that O
while O
technology O
has O
improved O
, O
commonplace O
practices O
still O
existed O
that O
worked O
against O
investors O
' O
best O
interests O
. O
It O
noted O
that O
customers O
whose O
orders O
were O
not O
displayed O
lost O
the O
chance O
of O
getting O
the O
best O
possible O
price O
available O
in O
the O
market O
. O
It O
also O

the O
potential O
problem O
of O
a O

, O

robbing O

without O
access O
to O
" O
hidden O
" O
quotes O
the O

of O
the O
best O
available O
prices O
. O
Earlier MISC

. O

" O

Muscular O

is O
a O

in O
which O
the O
body O

muscle O
tissue O
degenerates O
and O
is O

by O
fat O
. O
Death O
strikes O
in O
early O

. O
Individuals O
with O
the O
disease O
have O
a O
non O
- O

version O
of O
a O
gene O
responsible O
for O
producing O

. O
In O

at O

for ORG

Gene ORG

. O

genes O
. O

percent O
of O

in O

weeks MISC

. O

- O
